name: WooCommerce
natural_language_description: 这是 WooCommerce 节点。主要用于: Consume WooCommerce API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: product

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many orders

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: currency (值: None) - Currency the order was created with
customerId (值: None) - User ID who owns the order. 0 for guests.
customerNote (值: None) - Note left by customer during checkout
setPaid (值: None) - Whether the order is paid. It will set the status to processing and reduce stock items.
status (值: None) - A named status for the order

customerId.name: customerId
customerId.description: ID of the customer to update
customerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | 作用: ID of the customer to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: email (值: None) - Email address to filter customers by
order (值: None) - Order to sort customers in
orderby (值: None) - Field to sort customers by

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: currency (值: None) - Currency the order was created with
customerId (值: None) - User ID who owns the order. 0 for guests.
customerNote (值: None) - Note left by customer during checkout
status (值: None) - A named status for the order

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Product name | (必填项)

dimensionsUi.name: dimensionsUi
dimensionsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dimensions | 作用: Product dimensions | 默认值: {}

imagesUi.name: imagesUi
imagesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Images | 作用: Product Image | 默认值: {}

metadataUi.name: metadataUi
metadataUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Metadata | 作用: Meta data | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: after (值: None) - Limit response to resources published after a given ISO8601 compliant date
before (值: None) - Limit response to resources published before a given ISO8601 compliant date
customer (值: None) - Limit result set to orders assigned a specific customer
decimalPoints (值: None) - Number of decimal points to use in each resource
order (值: None) - Order sort attribute ascending or descending
product (值: None) - Limit result set to orders assigned a specific product
orderBy (值: None) - Sort collection by object attribute
search (值: None) - Limit results to those matching a string
status (值: None) - Limit result set to orders assigned a specific status

billingUi.name: billingUi
billingUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Billing | 作用: Billing address | 默认值: {}

couponLinesUi.name: couponLinesUi
couponLinesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Coupon Lines | 作用: Coupons line data | 默认值: {}

feeLinesUi.name: feeLinesUi
feeLinesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fee Lines | 作用: Fee line data | 默认值: {}

lineItemsUi.name: lineItemsUi
lineItemsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Line Items | 作用: Line item data | 默认值: {}

shippingUi.name: shippingUi
shippingUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Shipping | 作用: Shipping address | 默认值: {}

shippingLinesUi.name: shippingLinesUi
shippingLinesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Shipping Lines | 作用: Shipping line data | 默认值: {}
